entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is described as sitting in one of the chairs behind the velvet-covered desks, talking to a witch Harry had never seen before.

entities.name: victor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is standing moodily in a corner and not talking to anybody.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is in conversation with Fleur.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is described as looking happier than Harry had seen her so far and throwing back her head so that her long silvery hair caught the light.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having never seen the witch before and seeing Fleur's improved mood.

entities.name: witch
entities.description: A witch is described as wearing magenta robes and talking to Ludo Bagman.

entities.name: paunchy man
entities.description: A paunchy man is watching Fleur out of the corner of his eye.

relationships.description: Ludo Bagman and the witch are described as talking to each other.
Viktor Krum is not talking to anybody.
Cedric and Fleur are in conversation.
The paunchy man is watching Fleur out of the corner of his eye.
